summary: This is an email from August 11, 2019, containing a link to a Breitbart news article reporting that prison guards at the Metropolitan Correctional Center skipped mandatory checks before Jeffrey Epstein's death. The email is marked confidential and appears to be internal correspondence regarding media coverage of the incident.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document references his death while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, with reports that prison guards skipped mandatory checks beforehand.

events.title: Report on Skipped Prison Checks Before Epstein Death
events.description: A Breitbart news article reports that prison guards at the Metropolitan Correctional Center skipped mandatory checks before Jeffrey Epstein's death.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 11, 2019, discussing media coverage of Jeffrey Epstein's death.
It references a Breitbart article reporting that prison guards skipped mandatory checks before Epstein died.
The email is marked confidential and appears to be internal correspondence, possibly within legal or investigative circles.
The incident involves the Metropolitan Correctional Center where Epstein was held.
